issue.title: [CF 309] 'Check activation border' doesn't work
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Be a warrior.
2. Import the following:

``` ^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SIgnoreNomana^B ^SName^SRevenge ^SEnabled^B ^SUseActvtnOverlay^B ^t^N46205^S~` ^Sicon^^ ```

3. Block an attack while in Battle or Berserker Stance.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
'Check activation border' is supposed to make this button appear as usable when the button is highlighted yellow, regardless of stance. I clearly see the shiny yellow border around Revenge, however, the TellMeWhen button does not appear as it should. The same is true for Overpower.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
Made sure this bug was still active with r260. It is.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
There is no Lua error.


> Posted by CurseForge user daeger | Imported from CurseForge issue #309 | Raw
